author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three passengers of a government bus were injured when a small gas cylinder attached with a stove went off in a gas stove servicing and spares outlet at Karumbukadai on the Ukkadam to Athupalam Road, on Saturday. The unit belonging to Mukardeen was a service station for gas stoves.

On Saturday morning, the employees of the unit were at work servicing gas stoves when the mini cylinder-cum-stove burst.
title: Three injured
